## Hi, I'm Noah

A graduate student, self-proclaimed R enthusiast, and landscape ecologist. Welcome to ChartifyR!

Here, I share insights on R programming, ecological research, and data-driven storytelling. From coding tips to exploring the dynamics of our changing landscapes, this space blends science, analysis, and creativity for curious minds.
